overview: 'In Hock & Staying There' chronicles Alexandre's exploits as an Indie filmmaker as he interviews other filmmakers like underground legend David 'The Rock' Nelson, horror writer Jay Bonansinga (The Walking Dead) as well as many others during the 1995 Chicago Underground Film Festival. Far from any traditional 'documentary' 'In Hock...' explores Alexandre's descent into madness & veers into a horror/thriller of sorts...
tagline: He just wanted to make Cinema... he didn't think he'd go insane doing it!
title: In Hock & Staying There
